ComicInfo.Title: Daydreams and Nightmares
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Last Ronin II - Re-Evolution
ComicInfo.Summary: Having lain in wait for over a decade, underworld forces are making their moves to reclaim New York City. As the fighting gets more desperate, Casey Marie Jones and the new generation of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles struggle to save rebel bases under attack, but they’re outnumbered and lacking both intel and allies. With the tide of the battle rapidly turning against them, Casey Marie must make hard calls about who she can trust and how to keep her family and city safe. The legacy continues as legendary TMNT co-creator Kevin Eastman reassembles the acclaimed creative team for the epic next chapter of The Last Ronin!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-24 00:58:35. [CVDB1074050]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Esau Escorza, Isaac Escorza, Kevin Eastman
ComicInfo.Inker: Esau Escorza, Isaac Escorza, Kevin Eastman
ComicInfo.Colorist: Andrew Dalhouse, Fahriza Kamaputra, Luis Antonio Delgado
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Dalhouse, Ben Bishop, Esau Escorza, Fabi Marques, Fahriza Kamaputra, Freddie E. Williams II, Isaac Escorza, Joe Prado, Kevin Eastman, Luis Antonio Delgado
